TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MeetingRequest extends Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.MeetingMessage

Docs.summary: Represents a meeting request that an attendee can accept or decline. Properties that are available on meeting requests are defined in the MeetingRequestSchema class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.CalendarActionResults Accept(bool sendResponse) cil managed
Public Function Accept (sendResponse As Boolean) As CalendarActionResults

Docs.param: true to send a response to the organizer; otherwise, false.
Docs.summary: Accepts the meeting. Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Service (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.CalendarActionResults AcceptTentatively(bool sendResponse) cil managed
Public Function AcceptTentatively (sendResponse As Boolean) As CalendarActionResults

Docs.param: true to send a response to the organizer; otherwise, false.
Docs.summary: Tentatively accepts the meeting. Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Service (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AdjacentMeetingCount As Integer
public: property int AdjacentMeetingCount { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the number of calendar entries that are adjacent to the appointment in the authenticated user's calendar.
Docs.value: The number of calendar entries that are adjacent to the appointment in the authenticated user's calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AdjacentMeetings As ItemCollection(Of Appointment)

Docs.summary: Gets a list of meetings that are adjacent to the appointment in the authenticated user's calendar.
Docs.value: A collection of the meetings that are adjacent to the appointment in the authenticated user's calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AllowNewTimeProposal As Boolean
public: property bool AllowNewTimeProposal { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether attendees can propose a new time for the meeting.
Docs.value: true if attendees can propose a new time for the meeting; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AppointmentReplyTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime AppointmentReplyTime { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the time when the attendee replied to the meeting request.
Docs.value: The time when the attendee replied to the meeting request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AppointmentSequenceNumber As Integer
public: property int AppointmentSequenceNumber { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the sequence number of the appointment.
Docs.value: The sequence number of the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AppointmentState As Integer
public: property int AppointmentState { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the state of the appointment.
Docs.value: The state of the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AppointmentType As AppointmentType

Docs.summary: Gets the type of the appointment.
Docs.value: The type of the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.MeetingRequest Bind(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ExchangeService service, class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ItemId id) cil managed
Public Shared Function Bind (service As ExchangeService, id As ItemId) As MeetingRequest

Docs.param: The service to use to bind to the meeting request.
The identifier of the meeting request to bind to.
Docs.summary: Binds to an existing meeting request and loads its first class properties. Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).
Docs.returns: An instance of the MeetingRequest class that represents the meeting request that corresponds to the specified identifier.
Docs.exception: For details about this exception, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.MeetingRequest Bind (Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ExchangeService service, Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ItemId id, Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.PropertySet propertySet);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.MeetingRequest Bind(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ExchangeService service, class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ItemId id, class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.PropertySet propertySet) cil managed

Docs.param: The service to use to bind to the meeting request.
The identifier of the meeting request to bind to.
The set of properties to load.
Docs.summary: Binds to an existing meeting request and loads the specified set of properties. Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).
Docs.returns: An instance of the MeetingRequest class that represents the meeting request that corresponds to the specified identifier.
Docs.exception: For details about this exception, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChangeHighlights As ChangeHighlights

Docs.summary: Gets the highlighted changes to a meeting request. The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.
Docs.value: The highlighted changes to a meeting request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConferenceType As Integer
public: property int ConferenceType { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the type of conferencing that will be used during the meeting.
Docs.value: The type of conferencing that will be used during the meeting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConflictingMeetingCount As Integer
public: property int ConflictingMeetingCount { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the number of calendar entries that conflict with the appointment in the authenticated user's calendar.
Docs.value: The number of calendar entries that conflict with the appointment in the authenticated user's calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConflictingMeetings As ItemCollection(Of Appointment)

Docs.summary: Gets a list of meetings that conflict with the appointment in the authenticated user's calendar.
Docs.value: A collection of the meetings that conflict with the appointment in the authenticated user's calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.AcceptMeetingInvitationMessage CreateAcceptMessage(bool tentative) cil managed
Public Function CreateAcceptMessage (tentative As Boolean) As AcceptMeetingInvitationMessage

Docs.param: true to tentatively accept the meeting; otherwise, false.
Docs.summary: Creates a local meeting acceptance message that can be customized and sent.
Docs.returns: An instance of the AcceptMeetingInvitationMessage that represents the meeting acceptance message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.DeclineMeetingInvitationMessage CreateDeclineMessage() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a local meeting declination message that can be customized and sent.
Docs.returns: An instance of the DeclineMeetingInvitationMessage class that represents the meeting declination message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.CalendarActionResults Decline(bool sendResponse) cil managed
Public Function Decline (sendResponse As Boolean) As CalendarActionResults

Docs.param: true to send a response to the organizer; otherwise, false.
Docs.summary: Declines the meeting invitation. Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Service (EWS).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DeletedOccurrences As DeletedOccurrenceInfoCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the deleted occurrences in the recurring series.
Docs.value: A collection of the deleted occurrences in the recurring series.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Duration As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan Duration { TimeSpan get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the duration of the appointment.
Docs.value: A TimeSpan object that specifies the duration of the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property End As DateTime
public: property DateTime End { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the end date and time of the appointment.
Docs.value: The end date and time of the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EndTimeZone As TimeZoneInfo
public: property TimeZoneInfo ^ EndTimeZone { TimeZoneInfo ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the time zone of the End property of the meeting request.
Docs.value: An instance of the TimeZoneInfo class that specifies the time zone of the End property of the meeting request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EnhancedLocation As EnhancedLocation

Docs.summary: Gets location information such as the name, address, and optional notes for the associated meeting request. The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.
Docs.value: Location information for the meeting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FirstOccurrence As OccurrenceInfo

Docs.summary: Gets an instance of the OccurrenceInfo class that identifies the first occurrence of the meeting.
Docs.value: An instance of the OccurrenceInfo class that identifies the first occurrence of the meeting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IntendedFreeBusyStatus As LegacyFreeBusyStatus

Docs.summary: Gets the intended free/busy status of the meeting.
Docs.value: One of the LegacyFreeBusyStatus enumeration values that specifies the intended free/busy status of the meeting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsAllDayEvent As Boolean
public: property bool IsAllDayEvent { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the appointment is an all-day event.
Docs.value: true if the appointment is an all-day event; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCancelled As Boolean
public: property bool IsCancelled { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the appointment has been canceled.
Docs.value: true if the appointment has been canceled; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsMeeting As Boolean
public: property bool IsMeeting { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the appointment is a meeting.
Docs.value: true if the appointment is a meeting; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsOnlineMeeting As Boolean
public: property bool IsOnlineMeeting { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the meeting is an online meeting.
Docs.value: true if the meeting is an online meeting; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsRecurring As Boolean
public: property bool IsRecurring { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the appointment is recurring.
Docs.value: true if the appointment is recurring; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastOccurrence As OccurrenceInfo

Docs.summary: Gets an instance of the OccurrenceInfo class that identifies the last occurrence of the meeting.
Docs.value: An instance of the OccurrenceInfo class that identifies the last occurrence of the meeting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LegacyFreeBusyStatus As LegacyFreeBusyStatus

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the free/busy status of the owner of the appointment.
Docs.value: The free/busy status of the owner of the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Location As String
public: property System::String ^ Location { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the location of the appointment.
Docs.value: The location of the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MeetingRequestType As MeetingRequestType

Docs.summary: Gets the type of the meeting request.
Docs.value: One of the MeetingRequestType enumeration values that specifies the type of the meeting request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MeetingRequestWasSent As Boolean
public: property bool MeetingRequestWasSent { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the meeting request has already been sent.
Docs.value: true if the meeting request has already been sent; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MeetingWorkspaceUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ MeetingWorkspaceUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the meeting workspace (that is, the shared Web site for planning meetings and tracking results).
Docs.value: The URL of the meeting workspace.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ModifiedOccurrences As OccurrenceInfoCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the modified occurrences in the recurring series.
Docs.value: A collection of the modified occurrences in the recurring series.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MyResponseType As MeetingResponseType

Docs.summary: Gets the most recent response of the user who loaded the meeting.
Docs.value: One of the MeetingResponseType enumeration values that indicates the most recent response of the user who loaded the meeting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NetShowUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ NetShowUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the Microsoft NetShow online meeting.
Docs.value: The URL of the Microsoft NetShow online meeting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OptionalAttendees As AttendeeCollection

Docs.summary: Gets a list of optional attendees for the meeting.
Docs.value: A collection of optional attendees for the meeting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Organizer As EmailAddress

Docs.summary: Gets the organizer of the meeting.
Docs.value: An EmailAddress object that represents the organizer of the meeting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OriginalStart As DateTime
public: property DateTime OriginalStart { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the original start date and time of the appointment.
Docs.value: The original start date and time of the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Recurrence As Recurrence

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the recurrence pattern of the appointment.
Docs.value: The recurrence pattern of the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RequiredAttendees As AttendeeCollection

Docs.summary: Gets a list of required attendees for the meeting.
Docs.value: A collection of required attendees for the meeting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Resources As AttendeeCollection

Docs.summary: Gets a list of resources for the meeting.
Docs.value: A collection of resources for the meeting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Start As DateTime
public: property DateTime Start { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the start date and time of the appointment.
Docs.value: The start date and time of the appointment.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StartTimeZone As TimeZoneInfo
public: property TimeZoneInfo ^ StartTimeZone { TimeZoneInfo ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the time zone of the Start property and the ReminderDueBy property of the meeting request.
Docs.value: An instance of the TimeZoneInfo class that specifies the time zone of the Start property and the ReminderDueBy property of the meeting request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimeZone As String
public: property System::String ^ TimeZone { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the time zone that the appointment is defined in.
Docs.value: The name of the time zone that the appointment is defined in.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property When As String
public: property System::String ^ When { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a text value that indicates when the appointment occurs. The text value is localized by using the Exchange Server culture or by using the culture specified in the PreferredCulture property of the ExchangeService object that the appointment is bound to.
Docs.value: A text value that indicates when the appointment occurs.
